item.title: 타이틀 정보 조회
item.description: SELECT a.* FROM roomesc.oooshtit a where a.usr_id = :usrId and a.ordr_direct_Dt = :ordrDirectDt and a.vist_Sn = :vistSn

item.title: 마지막 저장된 타이틀 정보 조회
item.description: select stod_no from oooshtitl a where a.first_sys_dtm = ( select max(first_sys_dtm) from oooshtitl a where a.vald_yn = 'Y' and a.usr_id = :usrId )

item.title: 타이틀 정보 전체 조회
item.description: SELECT USR_ID , STOD_NO , concat( substr(ordr_direct_dt ,1, 4) , '-', substr(ordr_direct_dt ,5, 2), '-', substr(ordr_direct_dt ,7, 2)) ORDR_DIRECT_DT , VALD_YN , TITL_NM , SHOW_DT , FIRST_USR_ID , FIRST_SYS_DTM , LAST_USR_ID , LAST_SYS_DTM , ( select group_concat( ordr_nm SEPARATOR ', ') from roomesc.oooshordr z where z.usr_id = a.usr_id and z.stod_no = a.stod_no and z.vald_yn = 'Y' ) ORDR_INFO FROM roomesc.oooshtitl a where a.usr_id = :usrId and a.vald_yn = 'Y' order by ORDR_DIRECT_DT desc
